title: Operation skilltest
creator_credit: Robert Walker, Peter Johnson, Australia. Army. Director of Army Recruiting and Film Australia
brief_description: An army recruiting film showing something of the training for over 500 separate skills necessary to keep the Australian Army at peak efficiency and flexibility including truck driving, parachute packing and boat skills.
